TopicTitle: Mods not being found in GameData

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I've got a fresh install of KSP 1.0.4 and am trying to add mods using CKAN, which has downloaded them all perfectly and unzipped them in the GameData folder. I run KSP, and only 35 mods are being loaded, when CKAN is showing 62 installed. I understand some of these mods will be dependencies etc, but I have parts mods that aren't being displayed, like Near Future Propulsion for example. It's in the GameData folder and the folder structure is intact, but it's not making it into the game. I have tried installing them all one-by-one (took a long freaking time too) and I opened KSP back up, only 35 mods are being registered once again.

The mods installed one-by-one just fine until I got to the magic number of 35, then it stops adding them when the game is loading. Is there a setting somewhere that I'm not seeing? Or something I'm not understanding? This install is being run directly from my drive, not through Steam, and I'm on Windows 10. Thanks.

EDIT: Upon further digging it turns out the problem lay with KSP AVC and Community Tech Tree not showing things properly. Mods were in there and available, I just never checked in sandbox mod. Moderators please delete, as I can't figure out how to or if I even can.

Edited October 9, 2015 by theoracle09
